channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Well ok i guess i am a noobii to this, Here's a few questions.
1. Do you need a router to start your own Private Server.
2. If not is there another way forwarding my or a port?.
3. Am i screwed because i have no router.
Please help :)

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Nub.exe Nub.exe
item.description:
@Nub.exe wrote:

OMG ty guys so i aint screwed. A guy (not naming names) said i was screwed because i didnt have a router. So it’s all good now.

Thanks again =)

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @k3zzer k3zzer
item.description:
@k3zzer wrote:

Yes, that’s because most people use routers.
However, you do not need to do anything for modems, except allow the port in your firewall.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Nub.exe Nub.exe
item.description:
@Nub.exe wrote:

But in the “ultimate guild” or something like that mod dude posted,

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Read full topic
